# Dependencies
node_modules/
.pnp
.pnp.js

# Production builds
.next/
out/
dist/
build/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# IDEs and editors
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files

._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db

# Replit specific
.cache/
.local/
.upm/
.replit
replit.nix

# Database
*.db
*.sqlite

*.tmp
